title.jp: Jouriku, Gourmet no Shima! Bishoku-ya Toriko Arawaru!

synopsis: Chef Komatsu requested Gourmet Hunter, Toriko, to capture a Galala Gator for a party. While searching for the beast, they noticed the island's inhabitants were all acting out of place, as if chasen out. The Gator they were after wasn't what they'd imagined, but something twice as dangerous.

title.jp: Hikyou no Kyojuu! Toriko, Gararawani wo Hokaku Seyo!

synopsis: Special shown at the Jump Super Anime Tour in 2010.

title.jp: Houjun Naru Nanairo no Kajuu! Niji no Mi wo Tore!

synopsis: Toriko is commissioned by the International Gourmet Organization (IGO) to obtain the Rainbow Fruit, which is guarded by powerful Troll Kongs (four-armed large gorillas) in an enclosed sanctuary area called a Biotope. News reporter Tina follows Toriko and Komatsu through the biotope wall to try and get footage of Toriko in action. Toriko encounters a Troll Kong scout and immobilizes it with a stun gun, although he gets licked by its tongue. Toriko soon encounters more Troll Kongs but it becomes a chore to try to take all of them out. When the rain washes off the underling's scent, Toriko uses his intimidation ability and scares the Kong leader to surrender. Toriko takes a single fruit, however Tina is caught by IGO authorities and her footage is confiscated. Moved by the ever-changing flavors of the Rainbow Fruit, served in a jelly by Komatsu, Toriko declares the Rainbow Fruit as the dessert for his Full Course Menu. Meanwhile, various shady figures become interested in Toriko's movements.

title.jp: Sabake Moudoku Fugu Kujira! Shitennou Koko Toujou!

synopsis: Toriko's team and the Strawhat Crew of One Piece meet again, only this time they also meet Goku and the Dragonball Z Fighters!

title.jp: Doukutsu no Shitou! Ute, Go Ren Kugi Panch!

synopsis:
Toriko receives an important assignment from the IGO; he is to accompany Biotope head chief Ayame and find the special hidden menu detailing the full-course meal of the legendary Bishokushin Acacia.

The quest to uncover the secret of the special menu takes Toriko, Ayame, Komatsu, Zebra, Sunny and Coco through the dangerous Hungry Triangle to eventually land on the island known as “Acacia's Kitchen”. On the island they discover a bounty beyond anything they couldn't have imagined; rare species of animals, Regal Mammoths, terrifying monsters, strange ruins and a giant refrigerator.

Toriko and Ayame explore the ruins where they are confronted by Girim, the former Bishokukai Special Cooking Adviser. Even crazier, the 3 sous chefs and a new GT Robo step in, turning the situation into an all out battle!

title.jp: Nokkingu no Tatsujin! Fugukujira, Bisshoku no Toki!

synopsis: After eating the Hungry-la Bird that they captured, Luffy and Toriko team up again to save Nami and Komatsu who have been kidnapped by the Cocoalas.

title.jp: Saidai Saikyou no Ookami! Battle Wolf, Fukkatsu!

synopsis: Toriko, the legendary Gourmet Hunter, is hired by timid chef Komatsu to help track down a delicious Gararagator for a very important dinner. Will the intrepid adventures taste sweet success - or become their dinner's dinner?

title.jp: Arawareta Kyoui! Haran, Gourmet Coliseum!

synopsis: The International Gourmet Organization hires Toriko to harvest the legendary Rainbow Fruit, but the famed hunter will have to prove he's tougher than an entire nest of Troll Kongs before he can finish the job!

title.jp: Uketsugareru Mono! Kassei, Gourmet Saibou!

synopsis: Toriko and Komatsu set out to capture a Puffer Whale, but this daring quest to satisfy their exotic appetites may be the death of them both! Lucky for them, King Coco is along for the ride!

title.jp: Muteki no Ryouiki wo Motsu Otoko! Sono Na wa Sunny!

synopsis: Komatsu is kidnapped by a gourmet hunter who wants to use the boy as bait. Toriko and Coco are his only hope for survival, but they've got their hands full battling a deadly Devil Python!

title.jp: Shissou, Regal-tou! Jewel Meat wo Mezase!

synopsis: Komatsu finds himself face-to-face with a Devil Python, and the secret weapon Toriko gave him might get the young chef killed! Even if he survives, a daunting task lies ahead: removing the poison from a priceless Puffer Whale!

title.jp: Ma no Game! Devil Athletic wo Clear Shiro!

synopsis: Amidst the emergence of a horrifying new breed of evil, Toriko and Komatsu are hired by the IGO to track down the elusive and delicious Regal Mammoth and its priceless Jewel Meat!

title.jp: Saikyou no Suketto! Gekitotsu, Koko tai GT Robo!

synopsis: Toriko's epic rumble with the legendary Battle Wolf is derailed by an unexpected new arrival and the interference of an insanely evil representative of the Gourmet Corp!

title.jp: Kyoui no Moudoku! Coco, Shouri e no Houteishiki!

synopsis: Toriko fights and defeats the GT Robo. He then adapts the baby battle wolf as his pet, which he names Terry Cloth. Mansam tells Komatsu about Gourmet Cells but does not provide any more details. The Bishoku-kai are revealed to be after the Regal Mammoth as well. At the end the group has a feast (Mansam's Full Course).

title.jp: Kyoujin Naru Bigaku! Sunny, Otoko no Tatakai!

synopsis: Toriko and the gang are on the hunt for a Regal Mammoth when they cross paths with the Heavenly King, Sunny. With GT Robots on the prowl and Rock Drums dead ahead, they'll need Sunny's help to survive!

title.jp: Rin, Saigo no Negai! Kakusei Seyo, Chou (Super) Toriko!! (リン、最期の願い! 覚醒せよ、超

synopsis: While the villainous GT Robots continue their search for mammoth meat, Toriko has his hands full battling an ornery Obasaurus, and Komatsu learns the powerful secrets of the Gourmet Cells.

title.jp: Chou (Super) Toriko, Ikari no Kobushi! Korega Saikyou no Kugi Panchi! (超

synopsis: Toriko's daring attempt to navigate the Devils' Playground brings him face-to-face with a Soldier Frog, an Axeox, and an Avian Beast with hallucinogenic breath! Meanwhile, a GT Robot stalks the Regal Mammoth.

title.jp: DNA ni Kizama Reta Aji! Toriko, BB (Blue Blood) Koun wo Sagase! (DNAに刻まれた味! トリコ、BB

synopsis: Toriko's quick thinking saves Sunny and Komatsu from being crush by a mammoth, but there are greater threats looming. A giant GT Robot is ready to rumble, and the Gourmet Hunters are all out of strength.

title.jp: Tatakai no Sainou! Misero Terry, Ouja no Soshitsu!

synopsis: While Toriko searches for the priceless Jewel Meat, Sunny and Coco wage separate battles against deadly GT Robots! Will Sunny's hair leash and Coco's poison rifle be enough secure victory?

title.jp: Terry no Tame ni! Shakunetsu de Hajikero, BB Koun! (テリーの為に! 灼熱

synopsis: Sunny's battle with the GT Robot is complicated by the arrival of a Mega Octopus, and something extremely evil hunts Toriko and his famished friends!

title.jp: Bishokukai no Shikaku! Toriko no Waza, Shinka no Shunkan! (美食會

synopsis: Rin's tragic end sends Toriko into a rage, but the price of fueling his passionate attack may cost him his life. Meanwhile, Komatsu takes a heroic stand when the GT Robot tries to rob the chef of his favorite knife!

title.jp: Kyouki no Atsuryoku! Grinpatch tai Toriko!

synopsis: A bite of the delicious Jewel Meat energizes Toriko, who uses a vicious Ten-Fold Spike Punch to put the hurt on a GT Robot! When the dust finally settles on the battlefield, dinner will be served!

title.jp: Shokuji no Yuuenchi! Manpuku Toshi Gourmet Town!

synopsis: Komatsu must find an exquisite sauce to top a dish of very rare fish, and Toriko prepares to venture deep into the deadly Wu Jungle in search of food fit for a Battle Wolf!

title.jp: Yume no Jikan! Setsuno no Century Soup!

synopsis: Time is running out for Komatsu to complete his fishy dish, and Toriko watches as Terry faces off against a beastly Zombie Wood. Will the Battle Wolf show his true power - or fall to his ferocious foe?

title.jp: Deai no Sakaba! Gunyuukakkyo no Bishokuya-tachi!

synopsis: Toriko and Terry finally find the deliciously elusive BB Corn, and Komatsu must depend on a special blend of spices to survive an encounter with a giant lizard!

title.jp: Bishokuya Gundan no Chousen! Jouriku, Gokkan no Jigoku!

synopsis: Toriko must take his powers to the next level if he hopes to defeat a ravenous assassin from the Gourmet Corps. Elsewhere, Komatsu learns of the legendary ingredient with the power to stop - or start - wars!

title.jp: Zen wa Isoge! Hyoudo no Survival Race!

synopsis: Toriko continues his battle with the corn-stealing, straw-wielding villain known as Grinpatch, and Komatsu desperately races to make it home before a rare dish of fish becomes nothing more than bubbles!

title.jp: Hyouzen Yurugasu Bakuen! Fukumen Otoko no Shoutai!!

synopsis: Toriko and Komatsu travel to the city of culinary dreams for a special dinner with a living gourmet legend! Elsewhere, the sinister Gourmet Corps reveal the secrets behind their desperate desire for the Jewel Meat!

title.jp: Ranmannaru Mushi Tsukai! Tommyrod tai Toriko

synopsis: Komatsu and Toriko are treated to an ultra-exclusive tour of Setsuno's kitchen, including the top secret area where she prepares Century Soup! Inspired, they set off in search of the genuine article, but trouble lies ahead!

title.jp: Kansha to Hokori! Takimaru, Konshin no Sennuki Shot!

synopsis: Toriko, Komatsu, and a ravenous army of Gourmet Hunters set off in search of the legendary Century Soup. Their journey will take them to Ice Hell, but they'll have to survive a Sharkrocodile attack to arrive in one piece!

title.jp: Ketchaku! Match to Takimaru Sutemi no Oowaza!

synopsis: Tundra Dragons and killer icicles are just a few of the obstacles standing between Toriko and the Century Soup. If the elements don't kill him, there is a mean, green, GT Robot waiting to finish the job!

title.jp: Shoku no Saisei-ya to Densetsu no Soup no Yukue!

synopsis: Zonge stumbles upon a group of angry Growlruses, Toriko and company go head-to-head with a herd of ferocious Freezer Bison, and a villainous vice chef unleashes an army of beastly insects!

title.jp: Makkou Shoubu! Gekitou Toriko tai Tommyrod!

synopsis: Toriko and Komatsu team up to turn a deadly Silver Grizzly into a scrumptious soup. A villainous member of the Gourmet Corps is hot on their trail, but help is on the way in the form of a Heavenly King!

title.jp: Zettai Zetsumei!! Tommyrod Honki Mode Sakuretsu!

synopsis: When Toriko's hand is frozen solid during a deadly encounter with a Gourmet Corps bug tamer, the burden of collecting the Century Soup falls squarely on the small shoulders of Komatsu! Is the little chef up to such a big task?

title.jp: Kyoui no Chikara! Saisei-ya Teppei Sansen!

synopsis: Toriko fights to survive a deadly swarm of insects, and Takimaru fights for his life against an unbreakable opponent. Meanwhile, Komatsu's quest to collect the Century Soup is monitored by GT Robot!

title.jp: Saigo no Itteki! Century Soup wa Dare no Te ni!?

synopsis: Takimaru relies on lessons from his past to settle the score with his flexible foe, and Match puts his blade to the ultimate test against an opponent clad in Crash Turtle armor!

title.jp: Saraba Ice Hell! Setsu-baa no Himetaru Chikara

synopsis: Toriko heats things up in a heroic attempt to end the insect onslaught! Elsewhere, Komatsu finally reaches the location of the Century Soup - only to find that there is no soup!

title.jp: Goukai Chiryou! Saisei-ya Yosaku Toujou!

synopsis: Toriko attempts to end his epic battle with Tommyrod by unleashing a Thirteen-Fold Spike Punch, but the bug tamer counters by revealing the true depths of his devious strength!

title.jp: Kyousou! Toriko no Kanchi ka Komatsu no Soup ka!?

synopsis: The sudden arrival of a powerful Gourmet Reviver prompts Tommyrod to shed his skin, giving birth to a monstrous Parasite Emperor! The buggy beast is big and bad, but will he survive a bout with Hellboros, the ruler of Ice Hell?

title.jp: Shifuku no Sekai e! Jisshoku Century Soup

synopsis: Komatsu is crushed by his failure to capture the Century Soup, but Teppei has one more amazing trick up his sleeve. With evil forces bearing down on them, will any our heroes live to tell of their adventure?!

title.jp: Shinchiku Iwai! Sweets House ni Zen'in Shuugou!

synopsis: After being rescued by Granny Setsu, the weary and wounded adventures set a course for the healing country known as Life. Toriko has an arm to regenerate, and Komatsu is eager to recreate the Century Soup!

title.jp: Bishoku Ou Ketteisen! Kyuukyoku no Sweets wo Sagase!

synopsis: Toriko's gang arrives in the healing country of Life, an amazing land of curative creatures that can treat almost any ailment. After a chance meeting with Sunny, the group visits Teppei's master, a renowned - and rowdy - Reviver.

title.jp: Kizuna no Ippin! Partner wa Eien ni

synopsis: Toriko's recovery progresses faster than expected, but the strain of growing a new arm may cost him his life. Meanwhile, Komatsu struggles to find the final ingredient for his Century Soup!

title.jp: Hakunetsu! Toriko tai IGO Kaichou!

synopsis: With the help of an unusual ingredient, Komatsu finally completes the Century Soup! Thanks to the little chef's big accomplishment, Toriko may get his arm back - and add an ingredient to his Full Course Menu of Life!

title.jp: Tenkuu no Yasaibatake Vegetable Sky!

synopsis: Toriko returns home only to discover that his house has been eaten! Looks like it's time to call the candy architect and start gathering delicious ingredients for a new place to rest his head!

title.jp: Hakken! Yasai no Oosama Ozon-sou!

synopsis: Toriko, Sunny, and Coco set out on a death-defying quest to see who can track down the most irresistible sweets for a starving Seven-Colored Nellie!

title.jp: Oozora no Kokuhaku! Fumetsu no Combi Kessei!

synopsis: Sharkbox Turtles, Honey Dragons, and a Chomp Urchin plague the Heavenly Kings in their mission to feed the Seven-Colored Nellie. Can they survive this perilous quest and satisfy the starving beast?

title.jp: Shougeki no Deai! Nazo no Seibutsu Arawaru!

synopsis: Toriko tests out his new battle techniques - and his brand new arm - in a ferocious fistfight with the IGO President! Though his strength has improved, Toriko will need more training before he's ready for the Gourmet World!

title.jp: Toriko Totsunyuu! Gourmet-kai no Shinjitsu!

synopsis: Toriko begins his training with a mission to collect the delicious Ozone Grass. Komatsu is along for the ride, but is the little chef ready for brutal battles against Flying Sea Lions, Air Gorillas, and a Killer Bean Tree!?

title.jp: Kyoui no Suketto Toujou! Partner no Shin no Imi

synopsis: Toriko and Komatsu continue their quest to collect the Ozone Grass, but their journey only grows more difficult. Before they arrive at the garden in the sky, they must pass through a deadly thunderstorm!

title.jp: Saikai Toriko to Luffy! Kaisen no Mi wo Sagase!

synopsis: Toriko and Komatsu finally reach the Ozone Grass, but the legendary ingredient proves challenging to harvest. As the culinary adventurers struggle to satisfy their appetites, something sinister watches the scene unfold!

title.jp: Shougeki! Oreta Houchou to Togishi Melk

synopsis: Before completing their mission to capture the Ozone Grass, Toriko and Komatsu encounter an unusual beast that's identical to a GT Robot. What is this new menace, and what does it want?

title.jp: Kinpaku! Toriko no Knife tai Meruku Bouchou!

synopsis: Eager to test his new abilities in the Gourmet World, Toriko ignores the warnings of his closest friends and goes in search of adventure! Meanwhile, Komatsu is shocked by an unexpected visitor!

title.jp: Chou Juuryoku! Heavy Hole wo Kouryaku Seyo!

synopsis: Toriko's expedition into the Gourmet World proves more dangerous than he expected, but luckily, someone back home is looking out for him. Will it be enough to keep him alive?

title.jp: Kakusareta Shinjitsu! Shodai Melk Arawaru!

synopsis: When Komatsu breaks his favorite knife, he and Toriko set out to find a famed craftsman who is said to forge the strongest blades imaginable. Their journey - plagued by Rock Wolves and Scale Kongs - will not be easy.

title.jp: Ohirome! Nidaime Shuumei to Melk no Hoshikuzu!

synopsis: Toriko and Komatsu are shocked by who they find waiting at the home of Cutler Melk, and the legendary Gourmet Hunter's brash nature quickly leads to a knife fight!

title.jp: Konshin no Issaku! Kansei Melk-bouchou!

synopsis: Komatsu spends some quality time with Cutler Melk's apprentice, and Toriko delves deeper into the depths of Heavy Hole, where the gravity is intense and the Barbamoths are fierce!

title.jp: Chou Celeb! Gourmet Basha no Yume no Tabi!

synopsis: The intense gravity of Heavy Hole pushes Toriko's body to the breaking point. Back on the surface, Komatsu makes a shocking discovery about Culter Melk's apprentice!

title.jp: Tsui ni Toujou! Saigo no Shitennou Zebra!

synopsis: Toriko delves into the various mysterious of Cutler Melk, including his unusual voice, and Komatsu uses his culinary skills to give Melk's apprentice a confidence boost!

title.jp: Bakuon Kaihou! Shikeishuu Zebra no Shussho

synopsis: While Melk's apprentice works tirelessly to craft a special knife for Komatsu, the little chef and Toriko wait eagerly for the job to be finished - and the feast to begin!

title.jp: Keihou Hatsurei! Zebra Sand Garden ni Jouriku!

synopsis: Toriko and Komatsu take a trip on the luxurious Gourmet Carriage, but there's more to this vacation than sight-seeing and fine food. The adventurous duo is headed for the gates of hell!

title.jp: Komatsu Shissou! Ma no Desert Labyrinth!

synopsis: Toriko and Komatsu explore the despicable depths of Honey Prison as they make their way to the one called Zebra. Dare they hope to survive such a deafening encounter!?

title.jp: Fuuinsareta Koe! Ikoukan Gourmet Pyramid

synopsis: The one they call Zebra is released from prison just in time for Monster Season and a showdown with the horrifying Forrest Goblin! After he eats lunch, of course!

title.jp: Kikikaikai! Nazo no Komonjo to Hitsugi no Naka no Seibutsu!

synopsis: Komatsu voices his concerns about travelling with such a dangerous criminal, and Zebra makes some new friends after a slugfest with a savage scorpion!

title.jp: Shougeki Taiketsu! Salamander Sphinx

synopsis: A dangerous encounter with Desert Sharks leads to Komatsu's disappearance, which leads Toriko and Zebra to the foot of the Gourmet Pyramid!

title.jp: Renkei Chouri! Komatsu ga Ayatsuru Toriko to Zebra!

synopsis: Komatsu is trapped within the labyrinthine Gourmet Pyramid, and only Zebra and Toriko can save him. Unfortunately, a deadly Gorgonclops and a hideous Unicorn Cerberus are standing in their way!

title.jp: Gattai Waza Sakuretsu! Sekaiichi no Cola Itadakimasu

synopsis: Zebra and Toriko must eat everything in their path in order to regain the strength needed for their daring rescue mission! Meanwhile, Komatsu struggles to survive on his own!

title.jp: Akasareru Shinsou! Komatsu no Ishi to Nazo no Seibutsu no Shoutai!

synopsis: Zebra and Toriko finally reunite with Komatsu, but their troubles are only just beginning. To acquire the Mellow Cola, they must defeat a ferocious Salamander Sphinx, but they have no idea how to kill it!

title.jp: Chichi wo Koero! Manatsu no Gatsu Katsu Curry!

synopsis: Zebra and Toriko carry out Komatsu’s brutal orders as the little chef tells them exactly how to harvest the Mellow Cola. Their mission is on the verge of success when an unseen evil emerges!

title.jp: Tsunagaru Kizuna! Zeppin Gatsu Katsu Curry!

synopsis: Toriko and Zebra must work together to defeat the mysterious monster that attacked Komatsu. There's just one problem: the two warriors are completely out of energy!

title.jp: Shinkyokumen! Toriko no Ketsui to ”Yatsu” to no Saikai

synopsis: Komatsu must find the courage to stand up to Zebra and tell the truth about who he wants to be his partner. Later, the horrifying identity of the mysterious monster from the Gourmet Pyramid is finally revealed!

title.jp: Afureru Shokuun! Junrei Gourmet Jinja!

synopsis: Toriko's trip to the beach turns into an adventure when he agrees to help his favorite curry shop track down some much needed - and very dangerous - ingredients! First on the list: Water Tiger!

title.jp: Uwaa! Gyouten Bikkuri Apple!

synopsis: Toriko continues his heated battle with powerful Water Tiger, and Komatsu helps a heartbroken chef find the amazing curry cooking skills locked inside him!

title.jp: Niwatora no Tamago! Yocchi Jii-san to Tsuma no Kioku!

synopsis: Toriko's quest to get stronger leads the dynamic culinary duo to a remote cafe in the middle of a jet black lake. The food is fantastic, but the clientele is deadly!

title.jp: Suishou no Kagayaki! Sansan Gourami!

synopsis: Toriko and Komatsu visit the legendary Gourmet Shrine where they seek to increase their food luck! After sampling many delicacies and taking in the sights, Komatsu takes center stage for a surprising feat of strength!

title.jp: Shougeki no Gekiryuu! Kyodai Taki Death Fall!!

synopsis: Toriko and Komatsu hope to have the element of surprise on their side as they travel to the explosive Battle Island in search of the legendary Stun Apple!

title.jp: Sunny Shinwaza! Kareinaru Shugyou no Seika!

synopsis: After his recent lottery win, Komatsu wants to buy Toriko a gift. There's just one problem. The legendary gourmet hunter has his heart set on a priceless piece of land where the Chicken Beast lays its eggs!

title.jp: Gattai 30-bai! 36-ren Tsuin Kugi Punch!

synopsis: Toriko, Komatsu, and Sunny embark on a hair-raising quest to track down the Shining Gourami, an extremely rare sea creature that lives deep within Death Falls!

title.jp: Choukkan Chouri! Komatsu to Sansan Gourami!

synopsis: As the quest for the Shining Gourami continues, Toriko grows more and more impressed with Sunny's training. An unexpected battle with a Hippo Shark gives the rainbow-haired gourmet hunter a chance to show off his strength!

title.jp: Do Hade Enshutsu! Shokuji ni Saikou no Service wo!

synopsis: The devastating power of Death Falls sends Sunny into a flashback where he reflects on the days spent battling beasts and honing his instincts on the Road of Three Hells!

title.jp: Gokujou no Chitose Ame! Komatsu to Yun no Monogatari!

synopsis: Toriko and Sunny must team up for a powerful combination move that's their only hope for surviving the journey through Death Falls! But even if they reach the other side, they'll need help to capture their prey.

title.jp: Akiyama ni Shuugou! Terry. Yun. Kiss. Queen!

synopsis: Komatsu takes center stage as the little chef struggles to unlock the secret to preparing the Shining Gourami! Toriko and Sunny are exhausted and hungry, and Komatsu must listen to his ingredients if he wants to feed his friends!

title.jp: Saikai! Otogi no Shiro no Take-chan!

synopsis: When Melk the Second needs help finishing a very special knife, Toriko and Komatsu compete in a prestigious competition in an attempt to win the final ingredient needed to complete her project!

title.jp: Wakare Michi! Ryourinin no Mezasu Saki!

synopsis: Toriko and Komatsu are asked to track down the ingredients for a very special batch of candy, but the most unlikely of heroes ends up saving the day!

title.jp: Gekiteki Henshin! Biyoushitsu Barber Gourmet!

synopsis: Toriko, Coco, and Sunny race to see who'll be first to capture a delicious Supear, but their adventure takes a dangerous turn when Komatsu is abducted by Mutton Boars!

title.jp: Shitennou Shoushuu! Mafuyu no Yoru no Kiseki!

synopsis: A sinister force is abducting the top chefs in the world, and an old friend of Komatsu’s may be in great danger! Elsewhere, Toriko and Coco attempt to capture a rare appetizer!

title.jp: Merry Itadakimasu! Gourmet Santa no Okurimono!

synopsis: Komatsu is shocked by the lack of culinary honor exhibited by his old friend. Meanwhile, Toriko and Coco team up to open a giant treasure chest - but what they find inside leaves them baffled!

title.jp: Tengoku ka Jigoku ka!? Totsunyuu, Gourmet Casino!

synopsis: Toriko and Komatsu reunite for some much needed rest and relaxation at a gourmet barber shop. The food is superb, but their hair may never recover!

title.jp: Toujou! Chikaryourikai Boss, Livebearer!

synopsis: Toriko, Sunny, Coco, and Komatsu brave frigid temperatures and Bison Frogs as they search for a legendary tree that's entirely edible!

title.jp: Inochigake no Card Game! Gourmet Tasting!

synopsis: Chief recruits Toriko and the whole gang to help spread tasty Christmas cheer to hungry kids across the world! Even Zebra manages a good deed by mistake, and the holiday ends with a delicious miracle!

title.jp: Dead Heat! Coco vs Livebearer

synopsis: Toriko, Komatsu, and Coco venture into the Pleasure Zone on quest to track down some extremely rare Meteor Garlic, but they soon cross paths with an old friend who could use their help!

title.jp: Coco no Sakuryaku! Shoubu wo Kimeru Hazure Shokuzai!

synopsis: Toriko and the gang make a splash at the casino as they attempt to win enough cash and ingredients to be gain admittance to the VIP area, but what lies ahead could prove deadly!

title.jp: Kuu ka Kuwareru ka! Toriko vs Hannya Panda!

synopsis: Toriko, Komatsu, and Coco go head-to-head with Livebearer in a game of Gourmet Memory that could cost the loser all their memories of ever eating food!

title.jp: Climax! Nokosareta Saiaku no Sokuzai!

synopsis: Coco and Livebearer continue their epic showdown, but Toriko does most of the heavy lifting, devouring a mountain of pudding and handful of acorns as hard as bullets!

title.jp: Ketchaku no Toki! Coco no Souzetsunaru Scenario!

synopsis: The deadly game unfolding between Coco and Livebearer reaches an unprecedented level of danger as Toriko must face off against a fearsome Hanya Panda to avoid the agony of defeat!

title.jp: Umaki Uchuukyuu! Jisshoku Meteor Garlic!

synopsis: Toriko's slugfest with the Hanya Panda proves to be more brutal than expected, and even if he survives, the difference between victory and defeat may ultimately lie with Komatsu!

title.jp: Choujou Taiketsu! Ichiryuu vs Bishokukai Midora!

synopsis: Toriko keeps his team in the game by surviving mouthfuls of Shock Lemons and Nitro Cherries, but if Livebearer can withstand a bite of poison potato - all will be lost!

title.jp: Kakusareta Shugyou Shokuzai! Ichiryuu Kara no Kinkyuu Shirei!

synopsis: The true genius of Coco's plan is finally revealed as Livebearer finds himself unable to eat the poison potato, but the memory-devouring madman won't go down without a fight!

title.jp: Hashire Saikyou Gundan! Toriko to Luffy to Gokuu!

synopsis: Komatsu gets help preparing the Meteor Garlic from a very unexpected source, and Granny Setsu is paid a visit by the IGO!

title.jp: Hyakkai Kinen de Shitennou Zenin Daishuugou!

synopsis: Toriko searches for more training ingredients, Komatsu impresses his boss with dazzling new cooking techniques, and Ichiryu comes face-to-face with an old nemesis!

title.jp: Toriko Monzetsu!? Sekaiichi Kusai Shokuzai wo Hokaku Seyo!

synopsis: Before beginning the search for his next training ingredient, Toriko must defeat a ferocious Devil Planet Horse and then dine with a fortune telling sushi chef!

title.jp: Dekasugi! Prowres Waza de Kyodai Ehoumaki Kansei!!

synopsis: Toriko, Coco, Sunny, Zebra, and Komatsu compete to see who'll be the first to snag the ultra-rare delicacy known as Madam Fish! Winner gets the first bite!

title.jp: Gasshou Ichirei! Bishoku Ningen Kokuhou Chin Chinchin Toujou!!

synopsis: In search of the ingredients for a special sushi roll, Toriko and Komatsu travel to an island where the animals are drunk, and it rains champagne! But that's not all. They must also track down a funky fruit with a horrendous smell!

title.jp: Kanshanaki Mono Hairubekarazu! Kyoufu no Shokurinji!!

synopsis: Toriko and Komatsu visit an old friend who might be able to help them gather the seaweed they need to complete their epic Fortune Roll!

title.jp: Toriko Kanzen Haiboku!? Sensai Katsu Goukai, Shokugi no Iryoku!!

synopsis: Toriko and Komatsu try to eat their way to destiny by devouring Monchy's Fortune Roll, but they soon get distracted by a vanishing restaurant!

title.jp: Kansha Aru nomi! Shokugi no Gokui!

synopsis: The legendary Chowlin Temple holds the ingredient sought by Toriko and Komatsu, but the adventurous eaters might not be ready for the teachings of the temple's Master!

title.jp: Semaru Kyoui! Isoge, Toriko! Shabon Fruits e no Michi

synopsis: Toriko's quest to attain the elusive Bubble Fruit hits a snag when he must fight a surprisingly formidable foe. If the gourmet hunter wants to complete his quest, he must learn to honor the food!

title.jp: Sangeki! Shokurinji no Shuuen... Saraba, Komatsu!!

synopsis: Before they can truly honor the food, Toriko and Komatsu must master the art of gratitude by completing a series of tasks that prove far more difficult than originally expected!

title.jp: Gouriki Musou! Shokugi wo Kiwameshi Mono!

synopsis: His training complete, Toriko embarks on a lengthy journey to capture the Bubble Fruit! Meanwhile, back at Chowlin Temple, something evil approaches!

title.jp: “Kokuhoukyuu” Hitofuri Ichiokuen no Waza! Toriko vs Chiyo-baa!!

synopsis: Toriko pushes himself to the breaking point on his hunt for the Bubble Fruit, and a Gourmet Corp. raiding party wreaks havoc at Chowlin Temple!

title.jp: Maboroshi no Shokuzai “C” Ichiryuu to Saikyou Dai 0 Biotope

synopsis: Toriko uses his new technique - and the strength he gained by eating the Bubble Fruit - to easily destroy a giant green monster, but the Master of Chowlin Temple may not be so lucky!

title.jp: Densetsu no Hachi “Infini Bee” Toriko vs Shingata GT Robo

synopsis: Toriko shows off an awesome array of powerful new techniques in his battle with Granny Chiyo, but the arrival of a mysterious and terrifying GT Robot puts their bout on hold!

title.jp: Honryou Hakki! Komatsu no Shokugi Jisshoku! Maboroshi no Men "Zenmen"

synopsis: An unexpected visitor uses a dangerous technique in an attempt to heal Master Chin-Chin, and the strongest warriors from the IGO gather for dinner - and to prepare for war!

title.jp: Shitennou Shuuketsu! Gourmet-kai no Kaibutsu "Shijuu" no Mezame!

synopsis: Toriko and Komatsu are sent to search for Golden Wheat, but their mission is interrupted by the arrival of a terrifying and powerful new GT Robot!

title.jp: Jinrui no Sonbou wo Kaketa Tatakai! Shijuu vs Shitennou!!

synopsis: Toriko shocks the GT Robot with his amazing strength, and Komatsu gets an assignment from Granny Setsu that will put his powers of Honoring the Food to the ultimate test!

title.jp: Toriko, Coco, Sunny, Zebra Shitennou, Arashi no Moukou!!

synopsis: The Four Heavenly Kings share a mega meal together, Komatsu learns the secret to preparing Bubble Fruit, and the human world braces for the arrival of the Four-Beasts!

title.jp: Toriko Aratanaru Kiki: Shinobiyoru Shijuu no Hontai!!

synopsis: Humanity watches in horror as the Four-Beasts easily destroy the military's strongest weapons, but all hope is not lost - the Heavenly Kings are about to join the fight!

title.jp: Shijuu, Shougeki no Gattai to Green Rain!! (四獣、衝撃の合体と緑の雨

synopsis: The Four Heavenly Kings use every attack in their arsenal to survive their battle with the Four-Beasts, but there's a surprise in store for our heroes that could prove fatal!

title.jp: Shitennou Saidai no Kyuuchi! Komatsu no Ketsui!

synopsis: Toriko, Coco, Sunny, and Zebra appear to have the upper hand in their battle with the Four-Beasts, but the monster's main body is about to wreak havoc on civilization!

title.jp: Kiseki no Shokuun de Jinrui wo Sukue!!

synopsis: While Toriko, Coco, Sunny, and Zebra battle the monstrous Four-Beasts, Komatsu rushes to make an edible antidote to the toxic Green Rain that's drenching the city!

title.jp: Sakuretsu! Aji e no Koukishin! Shitennou Gattai Waza!!

synopsis: The Four Kings' battle against the Four-Beasts proves tougher than expected, and Komatsu tries desperately to speed up the process of making medicinal munchies!

title.jp: Ougi "Oushoku Bansan"

synopsis: Komatsu makes great progress in his quest to create a delicious remedy for the Green Rain, but the Four Kings find their attacks failing and their strength fading in their battle against the Four-Beasts!

title.jp: Kitarubeki Saiten: Ugomeku "Yabai Yatsura"

synopsis: The Four Kings hover on the verge of death until they recall a powerful technique from their training days - turning appetite into punching power!

title.jp: Toriko VS Gourmet-kai no Kaibutsu "Monplan"

synopsis: Teppei tracks down a mysterious stranger who may be responsible for the rampaging beast, and the Four Kings look to end the battle with their ultimate technique!

title.jp: Toriko Shinwaza "Nailgun"!!

synopsis: Teppei tries to remember the events that left him seriously injured, and Komatsu is honored by an invitation to participate in a world famous cooking festival!

title.jp: Daiharan Hisshi!? Cooking Fest Kaimaku!!

synopsis: Toriko battles a Plant Beast from the Gourmet World, Komatsu worries about his performance in a famous cooking festival, and CoCo gambles for information!

title.jp: Komatsu Pinch!? Triathlon Cooking!

synopsis: Toriko must come up with some new moves to defeat the Mon Plan, Komatsu worries about the upcoming cooking festival, and Zebra returns to the home of Mellow Cola!

title.jp: Densetsu no Ryourijin: Tengu no Branch, Kenzan!!

synopsis: Audiences applaud wildly as Komatsu and the Four Kings arrive at the legendary Cooking Fest, but somewhere deep in the darkness, a powerful evil prepares to attack!

title.jp: Do Hiretsu! Bakusou! Branch, Gobounuki!!

synopsis: Komatsu is intimidated by the competition at the cooking festival, but he's got even bigger things to worry about: a grueling test of strength known as Triathlon Cooking!

title.jp: Ikiru ka Shinu ka: Tenbin Death Cooking!!

synopsis: Komatsu falls far behind the field in the prestigious cooking festival, but when a top-ranked bad boy suddenly enters the competition, things could get even worse!

title.jp: Saikyou Combi wa Dare Da? Shima wo Marugoto Cooking!!

synopsis: Giraffe Birds and Sand Hamsters make their presence felt, Komatsu catches a lift with Brunch, and Triathlon Cooking kicks into high gear!

title.jp: Kaisen! Bishokukai Gekiretsu no Soukougeki!

synopsis: Komatsu must reach the next round of the Cooking Fest without the help of his special Melk knife, but advancing could send the little chef headed toward a fiery fate!

title.jp: Komatsu wo Mamore! Toriko VS Starjun!!

synopsis: Komatsu advances in the Cooking Fest, only to find out that his next challenge will be to cook an entire island! He recruits Toriko to help him out, but with the other Heavenly Kings cooking as well, the competition is anyone's game.

title.jp: Yasei no Tatakai! Toriko, Saikyou Kougeki!!

synopsis: Komatsu's preparations for the next round of the Cooking Fest are interrupted by an old friend. Meanwhile, Toriko and the rest of the Four Kings brace for the arrival of evil!

title.jp: Choujou Kessen! IGO vs Bishokukai

synopsis: When Komatsu's life is threatened, Coco, Zebra, and Sunny spring into action to defend the little chef, but the main attraction is a brutal showdown between Toriko and Starjun!

title.jp: Saiaku no Kirifuda! Gourmet-kai no Kaibutsu "Nitro"

synopsis: Toriko pulls no punches in his slugfest with Starjun, Rin wages her own unique brand of war, and an army of chefs give the Gourmet Corp. more than they bargained for!

title.jp: Shitou! Coco vs Grinpatch

synopsis: The epic battle at Cooking Stadium rages on as Toriko and Starjun continue to throw down. If Toriko's going to be triumphant, he's can't pull any knife-and-fork punches.

title.jp: Kettou! Sunny vs Tommyrod

synopsis: The IGO's chances for victory take a serious hit when the Gourmet Corp. unleashes the horrifying monsters Nitro and the Scum Beasts!

title.jp: Ketchaku no Toki! Sunny, Saigo no Chikara!!

synopsis: Thanks to Komatsu's super culinary skills, Coco and Toriko have the strength to carry on their battles with two of the Gourmet Corp.'s most powerful monsters!

title.jp: Gyakushuu! Zebra Shidou!!

synopsis: Sunny puts his heroic hair to the ultimate test in a bombastic battle with Tommyrod and his grotesque army of deadly insects!

title.jp: Toriko, Hangeki! Ultimate Routine!!

synopsis: Sunny's bloody battle with Tommyrod reaches its horrific end, and Brunch finds himself locked in an electrifying battle with an immortal warrior that cannot be destroyed!

title.jp: Shijou Saidai no Teki! "Joie" Shutsugen!!

synopsis: Zebra evens the odds by unleashing the furious power of his voice, Setsuno tangles with an old rival, and Komatsu is shocked to find Toriko on the losing end of a battle!

title.jp: Kyougaku! Kuromaku "Joie" no Shoutai!!

synopsis: Komatsu's heartbroken wailing helps revive a battered Toriko, who suddenly unleashes a devastating attack that harnesses the power of a great warrior's imagination!

title.jp: Owari no Hajimari! Toriko vs Joie!!

synopsis: Toriko's awesomely destructive battle with Starjun is interrupted by the arrival of Joie, an unbelievably deadly adversary who has the power to turn good into evil!

title.jp: Kishikaisei no Ichigeki! Shitennou, Kyuukyoku Waza!!

synopsis: After the legendary Knocking Master Jiro unmasks the terrifying evil before them, his life is endangered by his affection for Granny Setsuno! Will Toriko arrive in time to save them both!?

title.jp: Todoke, Komatsu no Sakebi! Toriko Kakusei!!

synopsis: Toriko and Starjun forge an unlikely alliance to save Komatsu from a deadly adversary, and a riveting flashback reveals the tragic story of Froese the God Chef!

title.jp: Toriko to Komatsu: Arata na Tabi no Shuppatsu!!

synopsis: Teppei and Jiro go toe-to-toe, the Four Kings fight together to survive their battle with Joie, and the evil masterminds behind NEO reveal their devious plan!
